tool_description: This API provides Covid-19 statistics by year, month, day and most recent day in Trinidad and Tobago
name: Trinidad Covid 19 Statistics
title: Trinidad Covid 19 Statistics

api_list.name: getMostRecentDay
api_list.description: This endpoint fetches the most recent Trinidad & Tobago Covid 19 statistics.  It returns data for that specific day alone.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://trinidad-covid-19-statistics.p.rapidapi.com/latestday"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "trinidad-covid-19-statistics.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://trinidad-covid-19-statistics.p.rapidapi.com/latestday"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "trinidad-covid-19-statistics.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: getStatsbyDay
api_list.description: This endpoint fetches Trinidad & Tobago Covid 19 statistics by  day. For a valid response, the months are input as "01" or "12" and not the actual month name such as "January" or "December". Th e days are entered in the similar format as months ie "01" -"31" and not actual days such as "Thursday" or "Monday",
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://trinidad-covid-19-statistics.p.rapidapi.com/year/2022/month/01/day/15"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "trinidad-covid-19-statistics.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://trinidad-covid-19-statistics.p.rapidapi.com/year/{yearid}/month/{monthid}/day/{dayid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "trinidad-covid-19-statistics.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: getStatsbyYear
api_list.description: This endpoint delivers Trinidad & Tobago Covid 19 statistics by year. For a valid response, the beginning year is 2020 and the latest year is the current year.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://trinidad-covid-19-statistics.p.rapidapi.com/year/2020"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "trinidad-covid-19-statistics.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://trinidad-covid-19-statistics.p.rapidapi.com/year/{id}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "trinidad-covid-19-statistics.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: getStatsbyMonth
api_list.description: This endpoint fetches Trinidad & Tobago Covid 19 statistics by month. For a valid response, the months are input as "01" or "12" and not the actual month name such as "January" or "December".
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://trinidad-covid-19-statistics.p.rapidapi.com/year/2022/month/01"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "trinidad-covid-19-statistics.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
